Row.Text: It is time for the greatest mercenary force in the world to show you what they're capable of!
Your lands will descend into chaos. It'll be the Wild West all over again. And once your lands fall into the fire, the others will soon follow!
Your lands will descend into chaos. It'll be the Wild West all over again. And once your lands fall into the fire, the others will soon follow!
Let's be honest, here. You saw this Declaration of War coming a mile away. My Deceptive score is 12, after all! Now die!
Very well! Come then, let us both bask in the glory of all-out war!
Oh, but you're a fool to think that you hold the advantage just because your army is bigger. You'll find out why soon.
Ah, you've got gall to attack someone who is much stronger than you! Very good! Let's see what you're made of, then![NEWLINE]Don't even think about using Firetuner or IGE, or I'll know!
Very well! Come then, let us both bask in the glory of all-out war!
Oh, but you're a fool to think that you hold the advantage just because your army is bigger. You'll find out why soon.
Ah, you've got gall to attack someone who is much stronger than you! Very good! Let's see what you're made of, then![NEWLINE]Don't even think about using Firetuner or IGE, or I'll know!

If Outer Heaven falls, then so be it. Its destruction merely proves it is no longer needed anymore! The world is already being consumed by the fires of anarchy, and those fires no longer need us to fan them.[NEWLINE]You're pretty good...keep it up.
Welcome to the domain of Outer Heaven -- the largest military the world has ever seen! But don't worry, you can trust me not to backstab you when you least expect it.

A world of combat. Where through battle, every man, woman, and child will know the fullness of life. That's my goal, strange new leader. Now, I know that sounds counterintuitive to what you're most likely trying to accomplish, but I believe you can benefit from it. Just trust me.
Tell me, what type of guns do you like? I'm sure someone as smart as you knows the value of a good, reliable revolver.
Your gall is unrivaled, coming to meet me in my headquarters like this. Very well, I'll listen.
I see that army of yours gathered near our borders! Are you wanting to offer them as torture-room subjects? I could certainly use more of those!
I'm not sure why you think it's a good idea to settle cities near some of the biggest military headquarters in the world, but this is my first and final warning: stop it, immediately.
Outer Heaven operates on the outskirts of civilized society, but there are times when they need to march right through them. Let's negotiate an open borders treaty, shall we?
